title: NVIDIA 535.98 Linux Graphics Driver Released with Wayland and Vulkan Fixes
description:
NVIDIA 535.98 graphics driver is now available for Linux, FreeBSD, and Solaris systems with various bug fixes for OpenGL and Vulkan apps, NVIDIA PRIME Display Offload, VRR monitors, and Wayland compositors.

The post NVIDIA 535.98 Linux Graphics Driver Released with Wayland and Vulkan Fixes appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: GNOME.Asia 2023 Will Take Place in Kathmandu for the GNOME 46 Desktop
description:
GNOME.Asia 2023 conference will be held in Kathmandu, Nepal, at St. Xavier’s College between December 1-3, for next year's GNOME 46 desktop environment series.

The post GNOME.Asia 2023 Will Take Place in Kathmandu for the GNOME 46 Desktop appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
